TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObjectReference

summary.span: 指示当前接口实施者是对另一个对象的引用。

span.span: Indicates that the current interface implementer is a reference to another object.

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

para.span: 在引用其他对象的对象上实现此接口，直到当前的对象完全还原后，才能对其进行解析。

span.span: Implement this interface on objects that are references to a different object, which cannot be resolved until the current object is completely restored.

para.span: 在修正阶段，将为实现 的任何对象查询其真实对象，并将该对象插入到图形中。

span.span: During the fixup stage, any object implementing is queried for its real object and that object is inserted into the graph.

para.span: 修正是指在对象反序列化过程中尚未完成引用的过程。

span.span: Fixup refers to the process of finalizing references not already completed during the object deserialization process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetRealObject(valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Public Function GetRealObject (context As StreamingContext) As Object

param.name: context
param.span: 当前对象从其中进行反序列化的 。

span.span: The from which the current object is deserialized.

summary.span: 返回应进行反序列化的真实对象（而不是序列化流指定的对象）。

span.span: Returns the real object that should be deserialized, rather than the object that the serialized stream specifies.
The actual object that is put into the graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在远程处理情况下非常有用，在这种情况下，您可以序列化代理创建者对象，而不是实际的对象。This method is useful in a remoting situation where you serialize a proxy-creator object, not an actual object. 反序列化代理创建者对象时，反序列化会调用其 方法。When the proxy-creator object is deserialized, deserialization calls its method. 此时，代理创建者对象会创建一个代理对象的新实例，该实例引用回原始实际对象（可能位于远程计算机上）。At this point, the proxy-creator object creates a new instance of the proxy object that refers back to the original actual object, perhaps on a remote computer. 最后，代理创建者对象将被丢弃并在以后通过垃圾回收进行回收。Finally, the proxy-creator object is discarded and reclaimed later by garbage collection. 例如，请考虑序列化 对象的方式。For example, consider how objects are serialized. 系统不会传输 对象中的数据，而是使用类型对象的名称以及在实现 的对象中找到的程序集的信息来传输持有者对象。Instead of transmitting the data from the object, the system transmits a holder object with the name of the type object and information on the assembly where it is found in an object implementing . 当类型名称和程序集名称都可用时，反序列化基础结构将对已传输的持有者对象调用 。When both the type name and assembly name are available, the deserialization infrastructure calls on the holder object that has been transmitted. 此持有者返回插入到关系图中的 对象。This holder returns the object that is inserted into the graph. 此方法受指定 的 的 保护。This method is protected by a for the with the specified. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

exception.span: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.

exception.span: 无法对中等信任的服务器进行调用。

span.span: The call will not work on a medium trusted server.
